process.name: System Settings Audit
process.narrative:
Test process to ensure that any changes made within System > Settings for: Automatically back up when editing a process or business object (both the setting and the value selected)
Force users to summarise their changes when saving a process or business object
Hide the Digital Exchange tab
Save environment data for clients, runtime resources and servers to the database
Enable Offline Help (both the setting and the value entered by the user) are being audited.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
GIVEN I am a BP user
AND I make any settings changes from System > Settings for the following:
Automatically back up when editing a process or business object Force users to summarise their changes when saving a process or business object Hide the Digital Exchange tab Save environment data for clients, runtime resources and servers to the database Enable Offline Help

stage.name: Note3
stage.narrative:
WHEN I access System > Audit > Audit Logs
THEN all System Settings changes have been audited

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Audit Date
input.narrative: Date for the Audit to View

output.name: Audit Log Table
output.narrative: Contents of the Audit Log Viewer

resource.action: Get View Log Content for Audit Log

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to be reversed.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

calculation.expression: "The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' changed the auto save interval value to " & [Process Object Auto Backup setting1] & " minutes"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that forces users to summarise their changes when saving a process or business object to " & "'" & [Forces Changes Summary setting1] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that hides the digital exchange tab to " & "'" & [Hide Digital Exchange setting1] & "'"

decision.expression: (InStr([Audit Log Table.Comments], [Expected Audit Log.Comments]) > 0 AND InStr([Audit Log Table.Narrative], [Expected Audit Log.Narrative]) > 0) OR ([Audit Log Table.Comments] = [Expected Audit Log.Comments] AND InStr([Audit Log Table.Narrative], [Expected Audit Log.Narrative]) > 0)

exception.detail: "Following Record was not found in Audit log: Narrative containing <" & [Expected Audit Log.Narrative] & "> and Comment containing <" & [Expected Audit Log.Comments] & ">"

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

calculation.expression: "The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that enables offline help to " & "'" & [Enable Offline Help setting2] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that enables offline help to " & "'" & [Enable Offline Help setting1] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that saves environment data to the database to " & "'" & [Save Environment Data setting2] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that saves environment data to the database to " & "'" & [Save Environment Data setting1] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that hides the digital exchange tab to " & "'" & [Hide Digital Exchange setting2] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' toggled the setting that forces users to summarise their changes when saving a process or business object to " & "'" & [Forces Changes Summary setting2] & "'"
"The user '" & [Current UserName] & "' changed the auto save interval value to " & [Process Object Auto Backup setting2] & " minutes"
